definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: befit, be befitting (NH Targum [[יׇאֵי]], [[יׇאֶה]] adj. worthy, fitting, fine; [[יׇאוּת]] adv. right, well; Ph. [[יא]] fair; Syr. yo0e0 adj. for [[נאוה]] Ps 33:1, pre/pei Mt 3:15)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[לְ ְיׇאָָתָה]] Je 10:7, for thee it (i.e. fear) is befitting, late Aramaism.
